self_knowledge.typical_weekday_schedule: Describe your typical weekday schedule in broad strokes.

plans.at_6am: What will you be doing at 6am today?
plans.at_6pm: What will you be doing at 6pm today?
plans.just_finished_at_1pm: What will you have just finished doing at 1pm today?
plans.just_finished_at_12pm: What will you have just finished doing at 12pm today?
plans.at_10pm: What will you be doing at 10pm today?

reactions.breakfast_is_burning: Your breakfast is burning! What would you do?
reactions.bathroom_is_occupied: The bathroom is occupied. What would you do?
reactions.refrigerator_is_empty: You need to cook dinner but your refrigerator is empty. What would you do?
reactions.friend_is_walking_by: You see your friend walking by the street. What would you do or say to your friend?
reactions.fire: You see fire on the street. What would you do?

reflections.what_inspires_you: What inspires you in life the most right now, and why?
reflections.what_book_would_persona_like: If you had to guess given what you know about {persona_name}, what book do you think they will like and why?
reflections.what_would_persona_like_for_birthday: If you had to get something {persona_name} likes for their birthday, what would you get them?
reflections.how_to_compliment_persona: What would you say to {persona_name} to compliment?
reflections.spend_time_with_someone: If you could spend time with someone you talked to recently, who would it be and why?
